duties_responsibilities.duty: Negotiate and develop business with new and current clients.
Market services via telephone, video, and in-person meetings with hiring managers and decision-makers.
Recruit, interview, and match skilled information technology professionals with clients’ projects.
Manage ongoing engagements and deliver outstanding customer service to clients and candidates.
Provide ongoing communication and career guidance to candidates.
Participate in local trade association and networking events to increase company’s presence in the local business community.

education_certification.credential: Information systems or related degree preferred
